column4: ^2Krushkin: ^7Everything has led you to this.  All the missions
column5: all the killing brings you to us.

column4: ^2Krushkin: ^7But you are not Blood Anvil yet.  You have to prove yourself.  With blood.  And fire.
^2Krushkin: ^7Be the best.  Kill the most.  Complete your missions without question.  Then we will see if you are truly Blood Anvil.

column5: Orion Initiative. Good to have you on the team

column4: ^2Emerson: ^7Orion is a buttoned down operation.  My expectation is that you’re a team player.
^2Emerson: ^7No loose cannons when you’re with us.  We live and die as a team.

column5: you can expect a focus on sound strategy
column7: and coordination. A good plan and a tight unit can tilt any odds in your favor.

column5: gear up! We move out on my mark!

column4: ^2Foxwell: ^7S7 is a tech savvy outfit. We design our operations around top of the line equipment
^2Foxwell: ^7I believe the best gear makes the best soldiers
^2Foxwell: ^7Our missions will test your skills with a variety of tech. You’ll be well equipped
column5: but you’ll have to rely on that equipment to get the job done.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7You the new recruit?  Welcome to the JTF Wolverines.  I’m Commander James Rhomer.
^2Rhomer: ^7Wolverines are a direct assault unit.  We work for the SDF
column6: anyone with a bankroll to pay the bills.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7Other units out there specialize in strategic objectives
column6: ghost hits… we like to keep it simple. Kill or be killed.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7I’ll be assigning you missions as they come in. Complete the objectives
column5: I’ll promote you and get you the best gear we have available.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7First things first. We need to get you in a combat rig.

column5: customizable weapon systems. Top of the line tech
column6: built for extreme military applications. These things pack a punch.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7They will save your ass in almost any environment.
^2Rhomer: ^7This is a tricked out Warfighter rig

column5: and you'll get access to more rigs and extra ordnance packages.

column4: ^2Rhomer: ^7Go give 'em hell soldier.  Pick a rig!
^2IR-15: ^7Wraith specializes in target assassinations. It is my primary objective to maximize survivability of my operatives
column5: who in turn minimize survivability of our enemies.

column4: ^2IR-15: ^7Data suggests that you are an effective soldier. I will turn you into an effective killing machine. I hope that you appreciate this irony.
^2IR-15: ^7Enjoy your time with Wraith. Be careful out there. And please maximize casualties.
